ODBC Test

Introduction

ODBC Test provides an interactive test facility for ODBC.

ODBC Test is depicted in "Figure 01". The appearance of ODBC Test may vary slightly depending upon the desktop environment.

Figure 01

Running ODBC Test

There are a number of ways to run ODBC Test.

 Command-line

ODBC Test can be invoked from the command-line as follows;

$ ODBCTestQ4
Figure 02

Desktop

You may find that the easiest way to run ODBC Test is to find it within your desktop menu/icon system such as the KDE 'start' menu.

Resources

  • http://unixodbc-gui-qt.sourceforge.net
  • http://unixodbc.sourceforge.net

Peter Harvey
